content: If you want to know why 100% reliability is the wrong target go to Chapter 2 of the SRE Workbook, you’ll find “… as you go from 99% to 99.9% to 99.99% reliability, each extra nine comes at an increased cost, but the marginal utility to your customers steadily approaches zero” between other good reasons
